name: EASTWING AVIATION TRAINING CENTRE
about: Eastwing Aviation Training Centre Ltd. is a Nigerian indigenous registered aviation training centre, established in 2012 by Dr. Christopher, a seasoned professional with over 30 years of experience in both military and civil aviation. Specializing in training and retraining aviation personnel to national and international standards, the centre offers rigorous and quality academic and hands-on training. Located in Enugu, near the Akanu Ibiam International Airport, Eastwing Aviation provides courses such as flight dispatcher training, helicopter landing officers, flight attendant training, and licence preparatory courses. With instructors from highly reputable aviation institutions, Eastwing Aviation aims to bridge the gap between local and international aviation standards, ensuring its graduates compete favourably in the global market. The centre's serene and strategically located environment makes it an ideal launch-pad for a career in aviation.
services:
["Flight Dispatcher Training
Flight Attendant Training
Human Factors Training
Licence Preparatory Course
Helicopter Landing Officers Course
Aircraft Fuel Quality Control"]
